targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    [AlarmID],
    [EntityID],
    [AlarmRuleID],
    [AlarmDate],
    [DateInserted],
    [DateUpdated],
    [AlarmStatus],
    [LastPersonID]
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE 
    [AlarmDate] >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()) - 1, 1)
    AND [AlarmDate] < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1);

select 
  $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d') AS time,
  [Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)
group by 
   $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d');

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
Where AlarmStatus = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN [Priority] =1 AND  DATEDIFF(HOUR,DateCreated,DateClosed) > 12 THEN 1 
 WHEN [Priority] =2 AND  DATEDIFF(DAY,DateCreated,DateClosed) > 3 THEN 1 
 WHEN [Priority] =3 AND  DATEDIFF(DAY,DateCreated,DateClosed) > 15 THEN 1 
 WHEN [Priority] IN (4,5) AND  DATEDIFF(DAY,DateCreated,DateClosed) > 30 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)  AS [Breached_SLA]
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[CASE]  WHERE $__timeFilter(DateCreated)

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve (in min)'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

SELECT 
  b.Analyst,
  b.[UnAssigned Alarms],
  b.[Opened Alarms],
  b.[Closed Alarms],
  b.Total,
  a.[Avg Time to Triage],
  a.[AVG Time to Close],
  a.[AVG Time to Investigate],
  a.[Avg Alarms Risk]
FROM (
  SELECT 
    FullName AS Analyst,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, GeneratedOn, OpenedOn)) AS [Avg Time to Triage],
    AVG(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, GeneratedOn, ClosedOn)) AS [AVG Time to Close],
    AVG(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, GeneratedOn, InvestigatedOn)) AS [AVG Time to Investigate],
    AVG(m.Priority) AS [Avg Alarms Risk],
    COUNT(*) AS Total
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
  JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS a ON a.AlarmID = AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
  JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ON a.AlarmRuleID = AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
  LEFT JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] AS p ON p.PersonID = LastPersonID
  LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] AS am ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
  LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] AS m ON am.MARCMsgID = m.MsgID
  WHERE 
    AlarmDate >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()) - 1, 1)
    AND AlarmDate < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
    AND p.PersonID IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY FullName
) AS a
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT *, 
    ISNULL([UnAssigned Alarms], 0) + ISNULL([Opened Alarms], 0) + ISNULL([Closed Alarms], 0) AS Total
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      FullName AS Analyst, 
      CONVERT(nvarchar, CASE
        WHEN AlarmStatus = 0 THEN 'UnAssigned Alarms'
        WHEN AlarmStatus IN (1, 2, 3) THEN 'Opened Alarms'
        WHEN AlarmStatus BETWEEN 4 AND 9 THEN 'Closed Alarms'
      END) AS AlarmStatus, 
      COUNT(AlarmStatus) AS Total
    FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
    JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS a ON a.AlarmID = AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
    JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ON a.AlarmRuleID = AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
    LEFT JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] ON Person.PersonID = LastPersonID
    LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToMARCMsg] AS am ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
    LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] AS m ON am.MARCMsgID = m.MsgID
    WHERE 
      AlarmDate >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()) - 1, 1)
      AND AlarmDate < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
    GROUP BY FullName, AlarmStatus
  ) d
  PIVOT (
    SUM(Total)
    FOR AlarmStatus IN ([UnAssigned Alarms], [Opened Alarms], [Closed Alarms])
  ) piv
) AS b 
ON a.Analyst = b.Analyst
ORDER BY a.Analyst;

panels.title: Attack Vectors Reported from Log Sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 10000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE [Owner] = 'Syed Rizvi'

SELECT TOP 10000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE [Owner] = 'Naggar, Omar Admin'

SELECT TOP 10000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE [Owner] = 'Ramy Ahmad'

SELECT TOP 10000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE [Owner] = 'Abodouh, Abdelrahim'

SELECT DISTINCT
	count(DISTINCT C.CaseNumber) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] C
Where C.CaseStatusID IN (3,4,5)
    --AND CT.TagID <> 28
    AND $__timeFilter(C.DateCreated)

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Open(Created)' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 3
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Resolved' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 5
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Mitigated' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 4
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  (DATEDIFF(DAY,LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated,ISNULL(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateClosed,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) as value,
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name] as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,4)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT 
  t.Tag AS Tag,
  COUNT(ct.CaseID) AS Count
FROM 
  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[CaseToTag] AS ct
JOIN 
  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Tag] AS t ON ct.TagID = t.TagID
JOIN 
  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] AS c ON c.CaseID = ct.CaseID
WHERE 
  c.DateCreated BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY, -30, GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
GROUP BY 
  t.Tag
ORDER BY 
  Count DESC

SELECT TOP 1000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
